Posts.Content: On 6/26/2008 Ruth601 wrote: First, I'm sorry for your news.  Now, take a deep breath and move forward.  You have a lot of information to gather before you panic.  Have you had a biopsy yet?  If not, wait until you get there results of that.  Many lumps are nothing at all.  If you've had a biopsy, what were the results?  Don't be afraid to ask questions.  Find out what all your options are.  Don't be afraid to get a second opinion.  You can get through this.   Best of luck to you,  diagnosed 2 years ago and doing great! thanks,no i havent had biopsy yet,i waiting for my doctor call back to set one up.im just alittle scared.did you have a biopsy does it hurt       x
Posts.Title: my doctor found two tumors

Posts.Content: im scared i dont no whats going to happen to me
